wikipedia_page.main: William Bowyer RA (25 May 1926 – 1 March 2015) was a British portrait and landscape painter, who worked in a traditional manner.

response: *  1926   – William Bowyer, English painter and academic (d. 2015)

* William Bowyer RA (1926 in Leek - 2015) portrait and landscape painter,The Guardian, 19 Mar 2015, William Bowyer, Obituary retrieved 3 March 2018 his work is "modern traditional" figurative painting
* William Bowyer (Keeper of the Records) (d.1569/70), English politician and antiquary
* William Bowyer (1663-1737), British printer, father of the above William Bowyer

Artists who have exhibited at the gallery include William Bowyer, Peter Brown, James Dodds, Rose Hilton, Kurt Jackson,Kurt Jackson — Biography . Edward Piper, John PiperMusson, John, John and Edward Piper. Country Life, 7 June 2007. and Jeremy Annear.
*William Bowyer (15th century MP), in 1411 MP for Newcastle-under-Lyme (UK Parliament constituency)
*William Bowyer (died 1602), MP for Stafford (UK Parliament constituency)
*William Bowyer (Keeper of the Records), MP for Westminster (UK Parliament constituency) and Keeper of the Records in the Tower
*William Bowyer (died 1616), MP for Carlisle (UK Parliament constituency), Dunheved and Appleby
*Sir William Bowyer, 1st Baronet (1612–1679), English MP for Buckinghamshire
*William Bowyer (artist) (born 1926), British portrait and landscape painter
* Sir William Bowyer-Smijth, 11th Baronet (1814–1883), British MP for South Essex
